content: smoothfox s easter day square 12 x 12 created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfox ©2009 version 1 0 red heart super saver medium worsted 4 ply color a orchid color b lavender stitch marker 1 hook size i 5 50 mm size 12 x 12 skill level advanced beginner my ravelry store http //www ravelry com/stores/smoothfox-crochet-designs my etsy store http //smoothfox etsy com my crochet & knit related gifts http //zazzle com/smoothfox* my blog http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com/ if you crochet this item - please click on this link and add your own pictures as a project on ravelry http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-easter-day-square-12-x-12 just click on the crochet hook with the words hook it near the top right side and this will add your item as a project then you can add the pictures when you have completed your project this pattern is written in us terms crochet terminology united states international slip_stitch slip st = single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet = double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet = treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet = double treble_crochet dtr double treble_crochet dtr = triple treble_crochet ttr triple treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet = quadruple treble_crochet qtr skip = miss instructions using color a chain 4 and join to make a ring or use the magic magic_ring see www crochetpatterncentral com under tutorials round 1 chain 3 11 double_crochet s in ring join to top of beginning chain-3 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet s in next st chain-2 * 2 double_crochet s in next st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet s in next st chain-2 * repeat from * to * twice join to top of beginning chain-3 with a sl st 20 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet s n next st chain-3 skip chain-2 space * 2 double_crochet s in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet s in next st chain-3 skip chain-2 space * repeat from * to * twice join to top of beginning chain-3 with a slip_stitch finish off 28 double_crochet round 4 join color b with a slip_stitch in any chain-3 corner chain 3 4 double_crochet s in same space chain 2 skip first 2 sts 2 double_crochet s in next st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet s in next st skip last 2 sts chain 2 * 5 double_crochet s in chain-3 space chain 2 skip first 2 sts 2 double_crochet s in next st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet s in next st chain 2 skip last 2 sts * repeat from * to * twice join to top of beginning chain-3 with a slip_stitch 40 double_crochet round 5 chain 3 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 2 sts insert stitch marker in the 2nd double_crochet just made double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet s in next st chain-2 skip chain-2 space * 2 double_crochet s
